Instance Method# formIndex(_:offsetBy:limitedBy:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
func formIndex(
    _ i: inout FlattenSequence<Base>.Index,
    offsetBy n: Int,
    limitedBy limit: FlattenSequence<Base>.Index
) -> Bool
```

Available when `Base` conforms to `Collection` and `Base.Element` conforms to `Collection`.
